description: This source file implements the Monitor plugin for WPEFramework, providing API endpoints for resetting statistics, setting restart limits, retrieving status, and signaling actions. It registers and unregisters API methods and handles internal monitor calls.

classes.name: Monitor
classes.description: A class managing monitoring functionalities, including registration of API endpoints, status retrieval, and event signaling within the WPEFramework plugin.

methods.name: void RegisterAll()
methods.description: Registers all API endpoints and properties related to the monitor plugin.

methods.name: void UnregisterAll()
methods.description: Unregisters all API endpoints and properties.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_restartlimits(const RestartlimitsParamsData & params)
methods.description: Sets new restart limits for a specific plugin identified by callsign.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData & params,InfoInfo & response)
methods.description: Resets statistics for a plugin and returns its snapshot information.

methods.name: uint32_t get_status(const string & index,Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo> & response) const
methods.description: Retrieves memory and process statistics for a plugin or all monitored plugins.

methods.name: void event_action(const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)
methods.description: Signals an action taken by the monitor for a specific plugin.

ctags.name: endpoint_resetstats
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData& params, InfoInfo& response/

ctags.name: event_action
ctags.pattern: /^    void Monitor::event_action(const string& callsign, const string& action, const string& reaso/
ctags.signature: (const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)

ctags.name: get_status
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::get_status(const string& index, Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo>& response)/
